title: HR & Internshipment Controller Coordinator
summary: It's important to note that the specific responsibilities may vary depending on the NGO's size, structure, and available resources. Some organizations may have dedicated HR and internship program Coordinator, while others may combine these roles or assign them to different individuals within the organization. It is a Permanent-Type Position.

title: Designing Coordinator
summary: The role of a Designing Coordinator for an NGO (Non-Governmental Organization) can vary depending on the organization's size, focus, and specific needs. The Designing Coordinator plays a crucial role in visually representing the NGO and its work, ensuring that the organization's messages are effectively communicated to various stakeholders and the general public. It is a Permanent-Type Position.

title: Operations Coordinator
summary: The role of an Operations Coordinator for an NGO (Non-Governmental Organization) typically involves managing and coordinating various operational activities to ensure the smooth functioning of the organization and the successful implementation of its programs and projects. The Operations Coordinator may also be involved in additional tasks based on the organization's needs. It is a Permanent-Type Position.

The External Public Relation Coordinator may also be involved in additional tasks based on the organization's needs. It is a Permanent-Type Position.
